name: Project PGSYS
description:
PGSYS stands for Perfect Gun System, I am trying to make a really good gun system and i need all the feed back i could get. Next Update: 30/4/2018 (Estimated)  Update:1.4 (Released) go to the devlog to see what's new! controls:
  • WASD to move 
  • MOUSE to look around 
  • LMB to fire
  • RMB to Aim
  • Shift to Sprint
  • Q to change the fire mode (if the gun allows it)
  • F to inspect mag
